snippet.title: Nordicandia: Semi Idle RPG - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Nordicandia is a semi idle action RPG where you collect epic loot, craft and merge items, and level up your character to upgrade your abilities and beat the World Bosses!

Try the beta version on:
Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.IterativeStudios.Nordicandia
iOS TestFlight: https://testflight.apple.com/join/7rAXjfTE
Steam: Get a steam code on our discord server.

Game website: https://nordicandia.com
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/2eYatrD9r2
Developer website: https://iterativestudios.com
